messages.subject: OZZIE SWORD BAN - ADDRESS FOR SUBMISSIONS.
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Friends in Nihonto, Numerous persons have asked me where to send a paper submission - lovely and prestigious letterheads do carry weight.  The address
messages.messageBody:
Dear Friends in Nihonto,

Numerous persons have asked me where to send a paper submission - lovely and prestigious letterheads do carry weight. The address details are (surprise?) buried on page 55 of the Regulatory Impact Statement (RIS) - not up the front where I would put them...

The details are:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Submissions, comments or queries can be directed to:

Mr Chris Shea
Justice Policy
Level 3, 55 St Andrews Place
EAST MELBOURNE
VICTORIA
AUSTRALIA 3002.

Telephone: +61 +3 9651 6988
Facsimile: +61 +3 9651 6922
Email: chris.shea@...

This Statement (i.e., the RIS) can also be accessed directly on the Department of Justice's internet site at:

http:\\www.justice.vic.gov.au

The closing date for submissions is Monday 8 September 2003.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
My position is that the "status quo" is absolutely the BEST position for all considered in this horrific proposal.

Best regards,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
